Interface MessagingOperations

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommentOperations

    public interface MessagingOperations
extends CommentOperations
    CRUD Operation of a MessageSocialComponent.

      • create

        short create(SlingHttpServletRequest request)
      throws OperationException
        Creates a new message from/based on SlingHttpServletRequest.
        Parameters:
        request - the client request
        Returns:
        Http response status code.
        Throws:

      • create

        short create(ResourceResolver resolver,
             Resource resource,
             java.lang.String senderAuthId,
             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> props,
             java.util.List<javax.activation.DataSource> attachments,
             ClientUtilities clientUtils)
      throws OperationException
        Create a a new message with the specified Map of properties and List of attachments.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the root resource of the message to be created.
        resource - the resource that triggered the message creation.
        senderAuthId - Authorizable Id of the message sender.
        props - message properties passed as a java map.
        attachments - List of FileDataSource of the message attachments.
        clientUtils - A ClientUtilities object.
        Returns:
        the new MessageSocialComponent
        Throws:
        OperationException - if there is an error occurs

        Returns:
        the update message.
        Throws:

      • update

        Resource update(Resource commentResource,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> props,
                java.util.List<FileDataSource> attachments)
         throws OperationException
        Update the specified message with the specified Map of properties and List of attachments.
        Parameters:
        commentResource - the target message resource.
        props - a map of the properties to be updated
        attachments - a list of attachment to be added to the specified message.
        Returns:
        the new updated message resource.
        Throws:
        OperationException - if there is an error occurs
